amendatorysection.catchline: Driving while intoxicated, implied consent refusal; not eligible for pretrial diversion.
amendatorysection.para: No person charged with a violation of section 60-6,196 or 60-6,197 shall be eligible for pretrial diversion under a program established pursuant to sections 29-3601 to 29-3603 and 29-3605 to 29-3609.
